alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 11:25PM MDT until July 03 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest South Dakota and west central South Dakota, including the following counties, in northwest South Dakota, Perkins. In west central South Dakota, Ziebach. This includes the Moreau River, especially near and west of Usta. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1123 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Usta, Zeona, Arrow Head Buttes and western Cheyenne River Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
